description.value:
A Large, void shielded, near-impenetrable storage vault that may be locked to almost any trigger key. Attempts to open without a key requires -60 Tech-Use Test (using Security Systems Special Use) to disable Void shield, then -30 Security Test to open physical lock. Excess Brute force would destroy contents.

Requirements

Locking trigger examples: Biometric Information (fingerprint, retinal scan, DNA etc.), a personal sigil, a rare blooming flower, the sound of a particular chainsword, etc.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
